aima.core.environment.vacuum

Class NondeterministicVacuumEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.agent.impl.AbstractEnvironment
      • aima.core.environment.vacuum.VacuumEnvironment
        • aima.core.environment.vacuum.NondeterministicVacuumEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Environment, EnvironmentViewNotifier

    public class NondeterministicVacuumEnvironment
extends VacuumEnvironment
    Create the erratic vacuum world from page 134, AIMA3e. In the erratic vacuum world, the Suck action works as follows: 1) when applied to a dirty square the action cleans the square and sometimes cleans up dirt in an adjacent square too; 2) when applied to a clean square the action sometimes deposits dirt on the carpet.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown
